mapper.select: SELECT A.student_id AS studentId, A.student_name AS studentName, A.student_graduate_yn AS graduateYn, B.school_name AS schoolName, CAST((@rownum:=@rownum+1) AS unsigned integer) AS rnum FROM tb_student_info A LEFT JOIN tb_school_info B ON A.school_id = B.school_id JOIN (SELECT @rownum:=0 FROM dual) R order by rnum desc

SELECT A.student_id AS studentId, A.student_name AS studentName, A.student_graduate_yn AS graduateYn, B.school_name AS schoolName FROM tb_student_info A LEFT JOIN tb_school_info B ON A.school_id = B.school_id Where A.student_id = #{studentId}
